meanings.definition: The fleshy part of the face below the eye and above the jaw.
meanings.sent1: She pinched her cheeks to make them rosy.
meanings.sent2: His cheeks turned red when he was embarrassed.
meanings.sent3: The clown painted big smiles on his cheeks.
meanings.sent4: The cheeks of the mountain glowed in the sunset.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's cheeks were soft and warm when she kissed me goodnight.

meanings.sent1: The baby's cheeks were chubby and adorable.
meanings.sent2: She sat on the cold ground, feeling the grass tickle her cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The cheeks of the peach were soft and juicy.
meanings.sent4: The cheeks of the drum vibrated with each beat.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel stuffed its cheeks with nuts for the winter.
